name: Flame Noble Knight Renaud
desc: If you control a FIRE Warrior monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand), and if you do, it is treated as a Tuner. You can only Special Summon "Flame Noble Knight Renaud" once per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 of your FIRE Warrior monsters or Equip Spells that is banished or in your GY, except "Flame Noble Knight Renaud"; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Flame Noble Knight Renaud" once per turn.
